#summary How to compile python-tesseract for Homebrew(Mac Mountain Lion/Maverick)

=How to compile python-tesseract (for Mac Mountain Lion/Maverick )=

launch xCode, then go to Preferences -> Downloads and install "Command Line Tools". 
Restart Terminal and you will be able to use Make.

1. Install HomeBrew
{{{
ruby <(curl -fsSk https://raw.github.com/mxcl/homebrew/go)
}}}
2. remove old python (optional)
{{{
brew rm python
brew install python
pip install numpy
brew uninstall opencv

export PYTHONPATH="/usr/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages:$PYTHONPATH"
}}}

3. Install misc
{{{

brew -v update && brew -v upgrade
brew tap homebrew/science                       #needed for the time being only (30 June 2013)
brew install -vd --tbb opencv
#brew install homebrew/science/opencv    # enable it if the above command line don't install opencv
brew install wget axel swig subversion
brew install leptonica opencv tesseract  
}}}

4.
Either
{{{
svn checkout http://python-tesseract.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ python-tesseract
cd python-tesseract
export ARCHFLAGS="-arch x86_64"
python setup.py clean
python setup.py build
python setup.py install --user
export PYTHONPATH="/usr/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages:$PYTHONPATH"
python test.py
}}}

or 
{{{
wget https://python-tesseract.googlecode.com/files/python-tesseract_0.8-1.8.homebrew.macosx-10.9-intel.tar.gzsudo tar zxvf python-tesseract-0.8-1.7_20130612_.macosx-10.8-x86_64.tar.gz -C /
wget https://python-tesseract.googlecode.com/files/test-slim.7z
brew install p7zip
7z x test-slim.7z
export PYTHONPATH="/usr/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages:$PYTHONPATH"
python test.py

}}}
